metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35962 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the decompressionfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted wave file can lead toarbitrary command execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns decompressionin the `vcd2vzt` utility.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
